form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Application for Permit to Re-enter,, I-151

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/13/2023 9. I have have not claimed nonresident alien status for Federal income tax purposes, either by filing no income tax return at all or by filing a return as a nonresident, since I became a permanent resident of the United States. (If such status was claimed for Federal income tax purposes, state the years for which you made such claim, your address as shown on any income tax returns filed for those years, and the city and state in which the Internal Revenue Service office with which you filed such returns is located.) 10. I do do not intend to return to the United States after my temporary visit abroad. 11. I do do not intend to retain my status as a lawful permanent resident. 12. CHECK My Alien Registration Receipt Card is attached. ONE: Application Form 1-90 for issuance of Alien Registration Receipt Card is attached. 13. The Permit to Re-enter, if issued, should be forwarded with my Alien Registration Receipt Card to: My address as shown in block # 2 on reverse. U.S. Embassy or Consulate at U.S. Immigration and Naturalization Office at Other (Specify) 14. I do swear (affirm) that I know the contents of this application signed by me and that the statements herein are true and correct. (If application completed by other than applicant, that person must execute item 15.) NOTE. This application may be sworn before an M P. Triradi officer of the Immigration and Naturalization Service (Signature of applicant) without payment of notarial fee. Subscribed and sworn to (affirmed) before me this 27 day of September A.D. 1972 , at Springfield, MASSAchisetts (SEAL) My commission expires JUNE LY, 1977 for of officer Marker administering notay Public (Signature oath) (Title) 15. SIGNATURE OF PERSON PREPARING FORM, IF OTHER THAN APPLICANT I declare that this document was prepared by me at the request of the applicant and is based on all information of which I have any knowledge. (Signature) (Address) (Date) APPLICANT-DO NOT WRITE BELOW THIS LINE Action with regard to Alien Registration Receipt Card Application for Permit to Re-enter: I-151 submitted by Alien returned AR-103 or AR-3 submitted by Alien returned Permit valid Granted to New I-151 issued on basis of I-90 0378660 Single entry 10/27/73 Multiple entries Restriction on travel in following countries waived: Denied. Reason VOVE 10/28/72 SIGNATURE OF DISTRICT DIRECTOR DATE OF ACTION P. Form Boston a N OFFICE DATE DD E D OFFICE DELIVERY OF PERMIT INITIALS OF EMPLOYEE OFFICE DATE BY MAIL EFFECTING DELIVERY TO APPLICANT PERSONALLY RAL Bos 10/30/72
